name: overwintering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of staying or keeping plants or animals in a particular place during the winter: The plant has to store the energy it needs for overwintering. I thought this would be a good place for overwintering. See
overwinter
More examplesFewer examplesHe brings his bedding plants indoors for overwintering.Sow plants now for overwintering.Ivy does provide a very useful overwintering site for many small mammals and insects.
